phrases: He is got an Infinity Punch too?
His arms are following his punches!
The effect comes before the because!
Are those punches violating the laws of causality?
A mere dog with wings dare speak of infinity?
Infinity is a power of God.
The power to appear at any place and bless at any time.
Why cannot I reach you, Silvie?
This Union is making Amata suffer.
This is the labyrinth of Mikage's mind.
If I die, Mikage will not be able to control the Wings of the Sun.
It is what I get for being so stupid.
I cannot think of any other way to stop Mikage.
Amata's going to suffer if he loses Mikono.
I do not want Amata to suffer.
You do not deserve to get killed over the likes of Amata.
I no longer need your body!
The true Wings of the Sun were wielded by the gods of old one by one.
Now that they have been awakened,
the cursed bride and I are all the Elements it needs.
Now hear the wedding bells of revenge!
I will take this harlot's body and forge a new world as the God of Genesis!
The temperature is rising all over the world!
The water levels of the oceans and every body of water are dropping!
The Wings of the Sun has become a scorching flame to dry up the planet!
The whole planet's going to die!
But we do not stand a chance with just Vectors!
It is been a long time, Amata!
It is confirmed to be the Vector Shrade was last in!
But there do not seem to be any life signs...
It is the one Zessica was piloting before!
Now we have got two spare Vectors!
If we can just find one more...
You did not forget about me, did you?
I am from the south, you know!
The scorching sun and I are buddies!
We have three Vectors free now!
If you need a pilot, I will go!
If worse comes to worst, you two will be the Adam and Eve of the next generation.
I entrust it to you, my friend.
I want to defend both Jin's homeworld and the Earth!
Your spirit stayed to fight with us!
Now let us fight together, Cayenne.
I am getting too old for this.
You suffer and suffer, and still you stand...
Do you really want this harlot so?
I will put you out of your misery.
He is pulling the two planets together by force!
He is absorbing the life from both worlds!
You are the ones from 12,000 years ago.
There is no need for sorrow,
my future yet still dear sister.
You sacrificed yourselves because of me.
You did all you were able to, just as did we.
And hey, we met again, just like we promised.
Because Man and Angel were connected.
Not just once, but twice, you stole away the one I loved, you harlot!
Those are the shadows of Toma's heart, separated from his pure love.
You must see the rest of this story.
Overcome your fears and find the truth.
I will burn all you hold dear.
He did that with just one attack!
Let us give them a hand, bitch!
For Mikono, and for our world!
Way to make a bitch cry.
But you were betrayed and hurt...
Even so... even through all that...
I never wanted to acknowledge it.
That I stole your love away.
That I hurt you so badly.
It is somewhat late for apologies.
I do not care what you do to me!
Just spare all the other people of the world!
And I cannot let this go!
I will connect this soul torn between love and pain back together!
I am not giving up yet!
I let my Mom slip away from me!
I have regretted that ever since!
That is how Silvia... how Mikono felt 12,000 years ago when I left her!
I was born again so I could learn that!
I will not let you slip away from me this time!
I will not leave you again!
I want my love, Mikono, to be with me as I fight to save the world!
You cannot connect them by yourself!
if you share your feelings with someone,
Whether we grow old and wrinkled together,
or it ends for us right here as a legend!
I will be right there by you!
I will love you to infinity!
I was reborn to love Silvie, over 12,000 years.
But you love Mikono now, the way she is.
Finish this and complete your love!
It is got a new name now.
They are crossing space to rain on the parched earth!
The separated worlds are being united again!
Why will not you obey me?
I will accept you into myself.
Let us watch over this age together.
Sleep within me, shadow of love.
After all these eons, we are now together.
You betrayed me not once, but twice.
Why do I feel so warm inside you?
And now, love is permitted once more!
This is a dumb kanji pun based on what Kagura just said.
The whole kanji is'omou', but the top part is'i am about to' (now) and the bottom part is'kokoro' (heart).
